ActorTalk: Ross! Where the hell is he?! Tell him Master Pete is here to talk business!
(Oh no, it's the Gray Raven Commandant... Stay calm, breathe...)
You're wasting potential here. This product's great, but the marketing is a disaster!
Hand the place over to me—that's the smart move.
Alright, here's the offer: Ross, the staff, and you—each get 5% of the profits, no upper limit. Deal or no deal?
Fine. But don't come crying when this place goes under next time I show up!
I'm not letting Ross worry anymore. Time to focus on running the cafe.
I'm managing the place for now. Can I help you?
Feel free to report any issues to me, the acting store manager.
Ross is way more generous than that.
I don't take contracts on someone else's behalf.
